Title: No Internet Connection
ResolutionSteps: Restart router; check cables; contact ISP

Title: Windows Slow Performance
ResolutionSteps: Disable startup apps; run disk cleanup

Title: Emails Not Syncing
Problem: Emails are not syncing on device
ResolutionSteps: Reconfigure email account; check sync settings

Title: Application Crash on Launch
ResolutionSteps: Reinstall application; update to latest version

Title: WiFi Frequently Disconnects
ResolutionSteps: Move closer to router; change WiFi channel

Title: Low Disk Space
ResolutionSteps: Delete temp files; uninstall unused apps

Title: Battery Drains Fast
ResolutionSteps: Limit background apps; enable battery saver

Title: Unable to Login to Portal
Problem: User cannot log in to web portal

Title: No Sound from Speakers
ResolutionSteps: Set correct output device; update driver
